item.title: 2015 Singapore Christmas Gift Guide: The Joyful Edition
item.description:
The holiday season is here, and with it comes the need for corporate gift ideas. Fortunately, there are many options to choose from this year. Source: Kaizer Leather website. Kaizer Leather offers a variety of leather business gifts, ranging from handcrafted luggage to smaller leather accessories. One notable option is the Cavalry Business Bag (shown above), crafted from high-quality Italian calf leather and featuring a detachable, adjustable shoulder strap. ~ o ~..

item.title: Luxury Gift Guide for Christmas 2017 in Hong Kong
item.description:
Hong Kong offers a plethora of high-end gift options. Make a lasting impression with these distinctive incentive or corporate gift suggestions: For the Fashionable ](https://blogger.googleusercontent.com/img/b/R29vZ2xl/AVvXsEjTOBGQGtqMhlt_i0m3XHwBn1QjO906znU9xMy97VBPqWBHVy80nBxjOKm1Lgg1I_v5sIp6sxy7HGCTZRC2xSpXTAGFdVOIKDSwZQes3MFguk5NpzGOVFh1lp4vHGEYKbE_CzRPC6l2PblW/s1600/chandelier+earrings.JPG) Source: The 5th C. My 5-Ways chandelier earrings. The 5th C, a Hong Kong-based diamond consultancy and jewelry brand, presents My 5-Ways, a completely customizable pair of diamond earrings. At their core, My 5-Ways are elegant stud earrings. However, with a few simple adjustments, they transform into studs with drops, elegant dangle earrings, or eye-catching chandelier earrings...

item.title: Etihad launches exclusive city-inspired Business Class amenities
item.description:
Source: Etihad Airways. Etihad Airways has introduced new limited-edition amenity kits for their Business Class travelers. This launch is a collaboration between the airline and the luxury travel brand LUXE City Guides, a company known for its sophisticated travel guides. The kits reflect Etihad Airways’ elegant brand and include in-flight amenities and natural facial products. These products were specially created by Scaramouche + Fandango, a London-based skincare and grooming company...

item.title: Air Asia provides a complimentary Penang travel guide
item.description:
The low-cost carrier Air Asia is offering a complimentary travel guide for the island of Penang. Source: Air Asia e-DM. Penang, Malaysia is renowned for its distinctive cuisine, the UNESCO World Heritage site of George Town, and its Peranakan culture. The guide, designed to assist event planners organizing trips to Penang, encompasses the following: Food Art, Heritage, Crafts & Caf√©s Lifestyle & Nature Getting Around Calendar of Events The guide can be downloaded here...

item.title: Sydney's Christmas programme has been officially launched by the City
item.description:
Source: City of Sydney. Lord Mayor Clover Moore launched the Sydney Christmas program at Martin Place. Sydney has officially begun its Christmas celebrations, featuring an array of decorations, carols, light displays, concerts, Christmas trees, and special retail events. Lord Mayor Clover Moore expressed her enthusiasm for the festivities, stating, “Each year, we warmly welcome thousands of people from all over Sydney to the city center for our Christmas celebrations. With live concerts, vibrant light projections, excellent shopping opportunities, and the chance for kids to meet Santa, there’s something for everyone - visitors, shoppers, and locals alike...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/sydney-s-christmas-programme-has-been-officially-launched-by-the-city/

item.title: The Shizuoka guide provides exclusive tips for exploring the city
item.description:
Source: Shizuoka City Tourism & City Relations Division. The Shizuoka City Tourism & City Relations Division in Japan has created the “SHIZUOKA GUIDE,” a 52-page guidebook containing coupons. The guide helps inbound tourists enjoy local food and shopping at affordable prices. Information was collected from locals who typically share recommendations through word-of-mouth. The guide features: Lists of popular restaurants ranked by popularity. Locations offering local products like green tea and Mount Fuji souvenirs at reasonable prices...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/the-shizuoka-guide-provides-exclusive-tips-for-exploring-the-city/

item.title: New report on Expatriate Services launched by Alliott Group
item.description:
The Alliott Group has released a new “Expatriate Services” report to assist businesses in relocating employees internationally. Alliott Group’s global member firms help companies optimize their mobility process, evaluate compensation packages, and manage cross-border employment structures and expenses. The report, produced by a renowned international alliance of professional services firms, spans 29 countries, including Turkey, Australia, mainland China, Hong Kong, India, New Zealand, and Singapore. It serves as a resource for navigating the complex web of tax, immigration, and employment laws impacting globally mobile workforces...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/new-report-on-expatriate-services-launched-by-alliott-group/
